forgotPassword.title: Forgot password
forgotPassword.enterEmail: Please enter your email address to search for your account and reset your password.
forgotPassword.checkMail: The verification code has been sent to your email, please check and fill in the code below.
forgotPassword.otpExpired: The code is incorrect or has expired.
forgotPassword.sendOtpSuccess: The verification code has been sent to your email, please check and fill in the code below.

resetPassword.title: Reset password
resetPassword.passwordInvalid:
∙ Password must be 8 characters or more 
 ∙ At least one lowercase letter
 ∙ Included one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character.
